title: Server Lag, No Loss Prevented.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I was in a 5v5 ranked game and both my team and the opposing team encountered the Server Connection problems a multitude of times and in the end, cost us the game due to the to spikes.

After the match was over, it was set as a defeat.
This was not what I was hoping for, first the disconnections then the loss from something that was completely unavoidable ?
I want to see this fixed, and at least my ranked game reimbursed.

{{item:3070}}  Rito, pls.

replies.body:
yep, caused me to lose too.

still no loss forgiven
too bad, if it wasn't turned on when you lost nothing's gonna happen.
